thread.title: Gold Slips as Risk Appetite Fades

author: Ira Iosebashvili
title: Gold Slips as Risk Appetite Fades
text:
Gold prices fell Wednesday, pressured by a stronger dollar.
Gold for June delivery was recently down 0.7% at $1,323.10 a troy ounce on the Comex division of the New York Mercantile Exchange.
The Wall Street Journal Dollar Index, which measures the U.S. currency against a basket of 16 others, was up 0.4% at 85.25. Gold and most other commodities...
